name: @notus-pro/react
description: Notus PRO React - A premium React UI Kit and Admin for Tailwind CSS by Creative Tim.

scripts.build:preview: react-scripts build && gulp licenses  && mv build 4ff6562c8002aaa053782c31b2625e6a67028d16e1bfcc884cb11dfd1ba4d4c6
scripts.build:hidden: REACT_APP_HIDDEN=true react-scripts build && gulp licenses && mv 4ff6562c8002aaa053782c31b2625e6a67028d16e1bfcc884cb11dfd1ba4d4c6 build/4ff6562c8002aaa053782c31b2625e6a67028d16e1bfcc884cb11dfd1ba4d4c6
scripts.install:clean: rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install && npm run build:tailwind && npm start
scripts.build:tailwind: npm run compile:tailwind && npm run minify:tailwind
scripts.make:package: rm -rf lib/ && babel src/components -d lib && node copy-files.js && node resolve-lib-imports.js && create-index ./lib && cp src/assets/styles/tailwind.min.css lib/tailwind.min.css && cp src/assets/styles/tailwind.css lib/tailwind.css
scripts.publish:package: npm run make:package && cp package.json lib/package.json && cp README.md lib/README.md && cp CHANGELOG.md lib/CHANGELOG.md && cd lib && npm publish --access=public && cd ../
scripts.deploy: node preview-homepage.js && npm run build:preview && node hidden-homepage.js && npm run build:hidden && gh-pages -d build
